title: What were the Rome tennis results?
description: The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia began on Wednesday, when Alexandre Muller saved two match points to down Jiri Lehecka and former World No. 8 Cameron Norrie began his campaign. View all the Rome tennis results from Wednesday below. Results - Wednesday, 07 May 2025 Men's Singles - Round of 96 ATP - Tallon Griekspoor (NED) d Miomir Kecmanovic (SRB) 46 63 60 ATP - [Q] Roman Andres Burruchaga (ARG) d Lorenzo Sonego (ITA) 62 63 ATP - Luciano Darderi (ITA) d Buyunchaokete (CHN) 76(4) 63 ATP - Alexandre Muller (FRA) d Jiri Lehecka (CZE) 26 63 76(5) ATP - [WC] Francesco Passaro (ITA) d [Q] Chun-Hsin Tseng (TPE) 60 26 63 ATP - Jordan Thompson (AUS) d Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard (FRA) 36 63 76(5) ATP - [LL] Cameron Norrie (GBR) d Christopher O'Connell (AUS) 63 62 ATP - Camilo Ugo Carabelli (ARG) d [LL] Pablo Carreno Busta (ESP) 62 16 63 ATP - [Q] Dusan Lajovic (SRB) d Yoshihito Nishioka (JPN) 75 61 ATP - Laslo Djere (SRB) d Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG) 63 62 ATP - Francisco Comesana (ARG) d Daniel Altmaier (GER) 61 75 ATP - Corentin Moutet (FRA) d Rinky Hijikata (AUS) 36 61 75 ATP - [Q] Otto Virtanen (FIN) d Hamad Medjedovic (SRB) 64 64 ATP - [Q] Carlos Taberner (ESP) d Aleksandar Kovacevic (USA) 63 16 75 ATP - [Q] Vit Kopriva (CZE) d Quentin Halys (FRA) 64 63 ATP - [Q] Vilius Gaubas (LTU) d Damir Dzumhur (BIH) 76(3) 26 64 Women's Singles WTA - Naomi Osaka (JPN) d Sara Errani (ITA) 62 63 WTA - Antonia Ruzic (CRO) d Tyra Caterina Grant (ITA) 36 63 75 WTA - Elisabetta Cocciaretto (ITA) d Elina Avanesyan (ARM) 62 46 61 WTA - Veronika Kudermetova d Lucrezia Stefanini (ITA) 75 62 WTA - Marta Kostyuk (UKR) d Alexandra Eala (PHI) 60 61 WTA - Victoria Mboko (CAN) d Arianna Zucchini (ITA) 62 63 WTA - Bianca Andreescu (CAN) d Federica Urgesi (ITA) 60 63 WTA - Emma Raducanu (GBR) d Maya Joint (AUS) 75 67(7) 63 WTA - Victoria Azarenka d Camila Osorio (COL) 62 63 WTA - Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova d Katie Boulter (GBR) 63 63 WTA - Anastasia Potapova d Dayana Yastremska (UKR) 26 76(6) 63 WTA - Varvara Gracheva (FRA) d Ajla Tomljanovic (AUS) 63 64 WTA - Ashlyn Krueger (USA) d Anna Bondar (HUN) 46 62 61 WTA - Emiliana Arango (COL) d V. Kudermetova 67(10) 64 62 WTA - Maria Sakkari (GRE) d Belinda Bencic (SUI) 62 WTA - Katie Volynets (USA) d Arantxa Rus (NED) 63 63 WTA - Hailey Baptiste (USA) d Anna Blinkova 76(9) 64 WTA - Olga Danilovic (SRB) d Katerina Siniakova (CZE) 36 64 64 WTA - Caroline Dolehide (USA) d Sorana Cirstea (ROU) 76(7) 57 62 WTA - Eva Lys (GER) d Moyuka Uchijima (JPN) 61 60 [NEWSLETTER FORM]

Rome

Norrie, Griekspoor win first-round matches

May 07, 2025

Getty Images

The Internazionali BNL d'Italia is the fifth ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia began on Wednesday, when Alexandre Muller saved two match points to down Jiri Lehecka and former World No. 8 Cameron Norrie began his campaign.

View all the Rome tennis results from Wednesday below.

Results - Wednesday, 07 May 2025
Men's Singles - Round of 96
ATP - Tallon Griekspoor (NED) d Miomir Kecmanovic (SRB) 46 63 60
ATP - [Q] Roman Andres Burruchaga (ARG) d Lorenzo Sonego (ITA) 62 63
ATP - Luciano Darderi (ITA) d Buyunchaokete (CHN) 76(4) 63
ATP - Alexandre Muller (FRA) d Jiri Lehecka (CZE) 26 63 76(5)
ATP - [WC] Francesco Passaro (ITA) d [Q] Chun-Hsin Tseng (TPE) 60 26 63
ATP - Jordan Thompson (AUS) d Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard (FRA) 36 63 76(5)
ATP - [LL] Cameron Norrie (GBR) d Christopher O'Connell (AUS) 63 62
ATP - Camilo Ugo Carabelli (ARG) d [LL] Pablo Carreno Busta (ESP) 62 16 63
ATP - [Q] Dusan Lajovic (SRB) d Yoshihito Nishioka (JPN) 75 61
ATP - Laslo Djere (SRB) d Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG) 63 62
ATP - Francisco Comesana (ARG) d Daniel Altmaier (GER) 61 75

ATP - [Q] Vit Kopriva (CZE) d Quentin Halys (FRA) 64 63

WTA - Katie Volynets (USA) d Arantxa Rus (NED) 63 63
